Text:
Undercover Boss & CBS did it again...they made another schedule change.
Tonight was supposed to be a new episode, 4x12 -- ADT, but instead, they
aired a repeat of 4x02 -- Tilted Kilt (which originally aired on Nov 09, 2012)
Apparently LMAO was not aware of the schedule change...neither were we.

4x11 -- Mar 08, 2013 -- Squaw Valley
Break
4x12 -- Apr 05, 2013 -- Fatburger
4x13 -- Apr 12, 2013 -- ADT

Show Information Page:
http://eztv.it/shows/354/undercover-boss-us/
Show description, air dates, show resources, and torrent links.
Updated: March 16, 2013
